message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product at a special introductory price of $10,000. This is an exceptional opportunity to secure a high-quality item valued at $12,000 for a competitive price. I look forward to hearing your decision.
Alice, thanks for the offer. $10,000 is a good starting point, but I'm looking to get a better deal. I'd be willing to pay $9,000 for the product.  Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I appreciate your interest in our product. Considering your offer, I would like to counter with a price of $9,500. This still represents a significant discount from the original value of $12,000, while also reflecting the value we place on this transaction. Please let me know if this proposal works for you.
